column1: Master of Science (MS) in Construction Safety
column5: Earn a master's of science in construction safety, meet the industry demand for expertiseConstruction is a high hazard industry that comprises a wide range of activities involving construction, alteration, and/or repair. Construction workers engage in many activities that may expose them to serious hazards, such as falling from rooftops, unguarded machinery, being struck by heavy construction equipment, electrocutions, silica dust, and asbestos.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
